:• '''1300''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''450''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1750 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Max-Stream AC1750 MU-MIMO Gigabit Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=EA7400|pid=01t34000003wEDLAA2}} This likely uses the same hardware as the [[Linksys EA7500]] :but without 256-QAM support for 802.11n. {{WiFiCert|WFA64963|03/25/2016}} ===Links=== *[http://www.linksys.com/us/support-article?articleNum=191827 ''Getting to know the Linksys EA7400 Max-Stream
AC1750 MU-MIMO Gigabit Router'' on '''Linksys'''] *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/linksys-ea7400-max-stream-ac1750-mu-mimo-router.32979/ ''Linksys EA7400 AC1750 Router'' on '''SNB''' forums] __NOTOC__
